scholarships.name: AI for Good Scholarship
scholarships.description: For students pursuing studies in Artificial Intelligence with a focus on social impact.

scholarships.name: Data Science Excellence Award
scholarships.description: Supports outstanding students in Data Science and related fields.

scholarships.name: Web Developers of Tomorrow Scholarship
scholarships.description: Encourages students to pursue careers in Web Development and create innovative online solutions.

scholarships.name: Python Innovators Grant
scholarships.description: Rewards students who demonstrate exceptional skills in Python programming across various domains.

scholarships.name: Machine Learning Research Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supports graduate students conducting research in Machine Learning and its applications.
